extendedInfo.description: If you are Black Veil Brides's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Black Veil Brides's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Black Veil Brides's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Black Veil Brides's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - We Stitch These Wounds- Set the World on Fire- Wretched and Divine: The Story of the Wild Ones-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - A Devil For Me- Abeyance- All Your Hate- Beautiful Remains- Carolyn- Children Surrender- Coffin- Days Are Numbered- Devil's Choir- Die For You- Done For You- Exordium- F.E.A.R. Final Transmission- F.E.A.R. Transmission 1: Stay Close- F.E.A.R. Transmission 2: Trust- F.E.A.R. Transmission 3: As War Fades- Fallen Angels- God Bless You- Heaven's Calling- Hello My Hate- I Am Bulletproof- In The End- Knives And Pens- Lost It All- Love Isn't Always Fair- Never Give In- New Religion- New Year's Day- Nobody's Hero- Perfect Weapon- Rebel Love Song- Rebel Yell- Resurrect The Sun- Ritual- Saviour- Set The World On Fire- Sex And Hollywood- Shadows Die- Smoke And Mirrors- Sweet Blasphemy- The Gunsling- The Legacy- The Mortician's Daughter- The Outcasts (Call To Arms)- This Prayer For You- Unbroken- Unholy- We Don't Belong- We Stitch These Wounds- Wretched And Divine- Youth And Whisky

reviews.title: Annoying adds
reviews.comment: Always brings up adds while im reading the lyrics. And when you closed an add another one pops right back up again
reviews.author: Jayde Marsh

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: A good app and easy to use, but needs updating as it is missing some more recent songs such as Revelation, Let you down and Victory call.
reviews.author: chloe biersack

reviews.title: Brilliant!!
reviews.comment: Thanks to the app, I don\'t have to go online just to look for the lyrics. :)
reviews.author: Taz P.

reviews.title: I like the app. It seems like all the lyrics are correct.
reviews.comment: I see the other comments on here and can\'t help but think they\'re fake.  My daughter and her friends introduced BVB to me.  There is no way any of them have or ever would write that s***.  Either they are posers or in kindergarten. If they are real posts, I apologize if I offended anyone. Good day!  P.S. The ads are annoying.
reviews.author: Chris Miller

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: You should just update it because its missing revelation but the app is just great!
reviews.author: Gintare Rindzeviciute

reviews.title: Missing 3 songs.
reviews.comment: It\'s very good but what about the new songs we got? There should be victory call, revelation and let you down added. It\'s already been some time they\'re out there.
reviews.author: Liza Park

reviews.title: Really good!
reviews.comment: You should make one for Falling in Reverse, though.
reviews.author: Becca Payne

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Perfect I can learn the lyrics now
reviews.author: Angelli Robles

reviews.title: the apl
reviews.comment: I love this app it helps me to learn all my favorite songs, the only way it could get better is if it let you play the song while u read the lyrics its almost perfect
reviews.author: Brandon Dayton

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: This is awesome! I think every member of the bvb army should have this , easy to use and the lyrics are all correct even if you already know them all , its good to have! 5stars from me! ;)
reviews.author: sasha Howard

reviews.title: Really useful<3
reviews.comment: Thank you for making this! All BVB soldiers must have this!!
reviews.author: Melissa Alvarado

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: This is five star as all songs have the correct lyrics this is awesome but it would be good if it had the songs playing while your looking at the lyrics
reviews.author: chloe may harmes

reviews.title: Ads are annoying
reviews.comment: I love the app but PLEASE STOP with the ads! I\'m considering uninstalling this including the BOTDF one because I\'m sick of the ads that keep popping up. IDFC about a stupid free app I WANT LYRICS NOT ADS!
reviews.author: Annie Gonzalez

reviews.title: Fallen angels <3
reviews.comment: Lol didnt really need it cuz i know all the lyrics, but still cool      P.s. fallen angels rule!
reviews.author: Stephen Perry

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Works quickly, all lyrics are correct, and ya. Das alllll
reviews.author: Liz R

reviews.title: Sama hesham
reviews.comment: I love you black veil brides.
